other_tests.findings: A novel in-frame deletion mutation (H900488â€“92) was identified in the MC4R gene, causing the receptor to be unable to bind ligand.
The mutant receptor is expressed well on the cell surface but is completely devoid of ligand binding and does not generate cAMP in response to agonist stimulation.
Abnormal conformer was detected in the MC4R gene, indicating a mutation.
